content: 本系統將於今夜11:00 - 4:00進行維護，屆時或會無法連接。
The system will be undergoing maintenance tonight from 11:00 pm to 4:00 am, hence it may be inaccessible temporarily.

路線資訊已更新！如有錯漏，

按此

更正資料，感激不盡！

The database is updated! If there are errors or omissions, click

here

to update or amend! Thanks!

v. 5.0.0 更新
新增行車時間估算
數據仍在測試中 僅供參考
「做白老鼠」

The realtime data is still under test. For reference only.
"Click here to test"

如八號颱風警告信號於上課時始告發出，各班須立即停課。
轉堂校巴（5, 6A, 6B, 7）將停止服務。
穿梭校巴（1A, 1B, 2, 3, 4, 8, N）將繼續行走一小時。

If Typhoon Warning Signal No. 8 is issued during class, classes must be suspended immediately.
The transfer school bus (5, 6A, 6B, 7) will stop service.
The shuttle bus (1A, 1B, 2, 3, 4, 8, N) will be maintained for one hour.

打完地點之後要喺list入面揀～
如果唔係會識別唔到你去邊㗎！
